e: ￹`Adada~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `ako~.￺1. My feelings are hurt.  2. I have heart pain.￻1. 我的心受創傷 2. 我有心臟病
￹`Sa~`fa'inay~`en~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `iso~.￺Be brave.￻你要勇敢，你要像男子漢(對懦弱者鼓勵的話)
￹`'Atkak~ `ko~ `faloco'~ `nira~.￺His heart is stubborn * resistant.￻他的心很硬，他很固執，他很頑固
d.f: ￹￺literal physical heart￻字面上指生理上或肉體上的心臟
